text: The 1998 Round Australia Trial, officially the Playstation Rally Round Australia was the fourteenth and last running of the Round Australia Trial. The rally took place between the 6th and the 27th of September 1998. The event covered 18,500 kilometres around Australia. It was won by Bruce Garland and Harry Suzuki, driving a Holden Jackaroo.. ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left; font-size: 95%;" |- ! ! ! Entrant ! Drivers ! Car !
